Advanced Ability (Acuvore).name: Advanced Ability (Acuvore)
Advanced Ability (Acuvore).description: Your psychic might grows when you consume the minds of others. When you use your cognitive consumption on a creature, instead of regaining a focus point, you can gain a temporary focus point. You can have a number of temporary focus points equal to your maximum number of focus points, and these focus points last until your next daily preparations. Further, by spending a week of downtime, permanently reducing your number of investment slots by three, and consuming the minds of a number of creatures equal to your maximum number of focus points squared, you can permanently increase your focus pool by 1, to a maximum of 6.

Advanced Ability (Archlich).name: Advanced Ability (Archlich)
Advanced Ability (Archlich).description:
The magic within your body has finally settled, fortifying it and beginning to flow once more. Your maximum hit points increase by twice your level, and you become immune to disease and poison. Whenever you would fail a saving throw against an effect that would make you act against your will, you get a critical success instead.

Additionally, you slowly regain the magic lost during the process of ascension. For each decade after the ritual was cast, you regain the lowest level spell slot taken by your magical burnout that you have not yet regained (for example, 1st level after one decade, 2nd level after two decades, etc).

Advanced Ability (Astral Echo).name: Advanced Ability (Astral Echo)
Advanced Ability (Astral Echo).description: Your psychic powers allow you to absorb effects that alter your mind. When you succeed a Will save against a spell with the mental trait, you regain hit points equal to twice the spell’s level. If you would be the only target of a spell with the mental trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the saving throw.

Advanced Ability (Horde Lich).name: Advanced Ability (Horde Lich)
Advanced Ability (Horde Lich).description: You become capable of reconstructing yourself so long as one of your servitors remain. If you or a servitor you are currently possessing would be destroyed, you immediately possess one of your servitors, rendering it controlled by you and granting it 3 actions. You can still Command an Animal in this state. By spending a week of downtime, if you or any of your servitors are destroyed but at least one of you and your soul cage remains, you can replace destroyed companions and resurrect yourself at no cost. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.DRuaMtp4x68O8PJC]{Shatter Block} reaction.

Advanced Ability (Lich of Yhidothrus).name: Advanced Ability (Lich of Yhidothrus)
Advanced Ability (Lich of Yhidothrus).description: You can manifest an aspect of the worm around yourself, calling upon its power to consume time itself in the area around you. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1dsahW4g1ggXtypx]{Freeze Time} as a divine innate spell. When cast in this manner, you only get one set of three actions. This increases to two sets at 16th, and finally 3 sets at 18th level. When the spell ends after being cast in this manner, every creature that was within 30 feet of you at any point during the stopped time must make a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC. On failure, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure) as they see a vision during that brief eternity of the world being wrapped by the endless coils of the Ravager Worm.

Advanced Ability (Moss Lich).name: Advanced Ability (Moss Lich)
Advanced Ability (Moss Lich).description: While within your bound terrain, you gain fast healing equal to your Wisdom modifier. In addition, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to spell attack rolls and DCs while within your bound terrain. Further, you gain access to the critical specialization effects of your lashing vines unarmed attack.

Advanced Ability (Pale Herald).name: Advanced Ability (Pale Herald)
Advanced Ability (Pale Herald).description: You gain an advanced domain spell from one of your domains for which you have an initial domain spell. Additionally, you increase your total number of divine font spell slots by one.

Advanced Ability (Primordial Lich).name: Advanced Ability (Primordial Lich)
Advanced Ability (Primordial Lich).description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.WuO8hzsgio7GQ7S2]{Lord of Death} archetype feat, with one of your chosen domains being Destruction instead of Death. Additionally, when a creature within 30 feet of you fails a Will saving throw, you gain temporary hit points equal to the creature’s level.

Advanced Ability (Ravener).name: Advanced Ability (Ravener)
Advanced Ability (Ravener).description: Your ability to both survive and rip apart souls improves. You treat an attack roll with an unarmed Strike as a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20, as long as the attack roll was a success. When you critically hit a creature with an unarmed Strike, the target must succeed on a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save or gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} condition. If the target already has a drained value of greater than 0, their drained value instead increases by 1, to a maximum of drained 4. Whenever you apply drain to a creature in this way, your soul ward regains 5 Hit Points. This is a critical specialization effect. You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.oDPs7BbvX6bhmDd2]{Discorporate} free action.

Advanced Ability (True Lich).name: Advanced Ability (True Lich)
Advanced Ability (True Lich).description: Your lich powers grow to match the undead lords of myth. You gain an additional spell slot of 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th levels. The spell slots are added to the slots you used to gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.F1gDdRbJQE4nIApQ]{Lich Dedication} archetype feat. At 16th level, you gain an additional 5th-level spell slot, and at 18th level you gain an additional 6th-level spell slot.

Advanced Ability (Wraithlich).name: Advanced Ability (Wraithlich)
Advanced Ability (Wraithlich).description: Your flight speed no longer restricts the height you can Fly, and your damage resistance increases to 4. You can interact normally with physical objects.

Basic Ability (Acuvore).name: Basic Ability (Acuvore)
Basic Ability (Acuvore).description:
Your abilities allow you to feast upon the thoughts of others, draining them until they are nothing but a husk while bolstering your own capabilities. You gain the following major effects:

Cognitive Consumption When you would reduce a creature that isn’t mindless to 0 hit points with mental damage, you can choose to rip its mind from its soul and consume it. When you do, it is instantly killed and you regain one focus point. In addition, by spending a minute over an incapacitated or unconscious creature, you can attempt to consume its mind, casting the spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5BbU1V6wGSGbrmRD]{Never Mind} on them, after which they are immune to the spell when cast in this manner for one day. On a critical failure, you instead consume their mind, instantly killing them and causing you to regain a focus point. Any corpse left behind by a creature killed in this manner or by your mental damage is easier to raise; any create undead ritual cast using it has a +2 circumstance bonus to all rolls, but can only be used to create mindless undead.

Invasive Mind You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KHnhPHL4x1AQHfbC]{Mind Reading} as an innate occult spell at will. You can use this ability on mindless creatures as well; when you do, you learn their current orders or intents, as well as who, if anyone, controls them. This knowledge is portrayed very basically, often coming in the form of pictures or senses as opposed to coherent thoughts.

Basic Ability (Archlich).name: Basic Ability (Archlich)
Basic Ability (Archlich).description:
The amount of magic you can output has changed, but your powers allow you to exist and pursue your goal without issue. You gain the following major effects:

Magical Burnout Even after the ritual, your magic remains less than when you first started, causing you to cast fewer spells each day. Reduce your number of spell slots of each level by 1 (including 10th.

Colleague of the Living and Dead You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FM3SmEW8N1FCRjqt]{Talking Corpse} at will as an innate spell of your lich tradition. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.le4f6XKWSK9Kx9vg]{Mask Death} archetype feat.

Magic Resistance You gain a +1 status bonus to all saves against magic. This bonus increases to +3 if the effect would attempt to make you act against your will.

Archlich’s Knowledge While your magical potency has weakened, your knowledge has expanded with the conclusion of the ritual, granting you access to magics that may be unheard of by other mages. Select 4 spells that are not rare; up to 2 of these spells may be spells not normally available to your spellcasting tradition. You can either prepare these spells or add them to your repertoire just like the spells normally on your tradition’s spell list. When you gain this ability, you can retrain existing spells to replace them with ones on this list. Each time you gain a Lich feat, you can select one additional spell that meets these requirements, and add it as well.

Basic Ability (Astal Echo).name: Basic Ability (Astal Echo)
Basic Ability (Astal Echo).description:
Your body acts as a manifestation of your astral legend, granting you the following major effects:

Vain Imprints You are permanently under the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image} spell; if any images would be destroyed, you regain one every 10 minutes. You can regain all destroyed images by spending a minute focusing on your personal image. These images take on your form, but each appear to be performing slightly different actions related to your astral legend.

Bewildering Touch You may have your unarmed and weapon strikes deal mental damage instead of their normal damage type. Additionally, when you critically hit a living creature with your fist Strike, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC. This is a critical specialization effect.

Basic Ability (Horde Lich).name: Basic Ability (Horde Lich)
Basic Ability (Horde Lich).description:
Your mind is distributed between your companions, which merge together with you for travel. They can each be folded up and attached to you, usually in the ribcage, around the arms, and around the legs. You can have up to all three undead companions active at once, referred to henceforth as your servitors, with slightly more difficulty commanding them. If you don’t command any of your servitors, one of your active servitors can still use 1 action on your turn to Stride or Strike, as per @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uCElsebJ45ltmZMT]{Mature Beastmaster Companion}, but not both. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{Command an Animal}, your may choose one of the following effects instead (replacing the normal effects):

  • Choose one of your active companions to take two actions, as normal.

  • All active servitors Strike, with a -2 circumstance penalty to the attack roll.

  • All active servitors can either Interact or take a basic action with the move trait.

You and your servitors now share hit points, with your hit points increasing by 8 times your level. Spells and effects that target you or your servitors affect them all equally, but you and them are treated as just one creature when targeted by spells and attacks.  You attempt only one save against such effects using the highest save among those targeted, but take a -2 circumstance penalty to defend against effects that target you and one or more active servitors. Whenever you Cast a Spell, you can choose to have the spell originate from yourself or from any one of your active servitors.

Your servitors lose the mindless trait, and can attempt skill checks and saving throws using your skills and saves instead of their own. If their anatomy allows for it, they can also perform or assist in skill actions and downtime activities at the GM’s discretion. Their Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores become equal to your own, and cannot be modified by becoming a mature, nimble or savage, or specialized companion. Their personalities become extensions of your own, often representing aspects certain of your personality but ultimately a part of and subservient to you.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.0ykx62x5nlrQfJ5u]{Servitor Assembly} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.vG5zJCsb5Bu0OGGI]{Servitor Lunge} activities.

Basic Ability (Lich of Yhidothrus).name: Basic Ability (Lich of Yhidothrus)
Basic Ability (Lich of Yhidothrus).description:
Your flesh is wet and infested by– no, made wholly of worms, a sign of being blessed by Yhidothrus. You gain the following major effects:

Worm-Eaten Flesh The worms that cover your body protect your bones from harm, regrowing and multiplying even as they are torn to pieces. You gain resistance 10 to physical damage, as well as fast healing equal to your number of Lich feats. You also gain weakness 10 to area and splash damage.

Aging Touch Your magic steals life from creatures that you damage. Whenever you deal damage to a creature with a spell or unarmed Strike, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} on a critical) for the next minute as they are temporarily advanced to advanced age.

Basic Ability (Moss Lich).name: Basic Ability (Moss Lich)
Basic Ability (Moss Lich).description:
You bind yourself to the environment that you performed your ritual within. Choose aquatic, arctic, desert, forest, mountain, swamp, or underground. This becomes your bound terrain, and influences other abilities of yours. You gain the plant trait, as well as the following major effects:

Verdant Aura Your very presence causes nature to flourish; plants within one mile of you grow twice as fast, but produce half the yield due to an abundance of weeds and wild plants spreading through fields and orchards.

Verdant Shape You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{One with Plants} on yourself at will, becoming a natural object associated with your bound terrain, such as a tree, cactus, or mushroom. Whenever you hit a creature with melee Strike, you also cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tangle Vine} spell as a free action targeting the creature.

Lashing Vines You can extend vines or similar structures from yourself to attack creatures. You can extend or retract them as an action; while extended, you gain the lashing vines unarmed attack. It deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage, is in the flail weapon group, and has the grapple, reach, shove, sweep, trip, unarmed, and versatile p traits. When attacking with it, you may use your spell attack modifier instead of your unarmed attack modifier; when doing so, you do not add your Strength or Dexterity to the damage.

Verdant Voice You are permanently under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}. If it would ever be dispelled, you can cast it again at any time as a free action as an innate primal spell, with its duration becoming permanent.

Basic Ability (Pale Herald).name: Basic Ability (Pale Herald)
Basic Ability (Pale Herald).description:
You become a powerful undead vessel for your deity’s power, granting you the following major effects:

Blessed Body You gain the Sanctification cleric feature if you did not have it. Your deity’s options always count as “must be.” You gain a +1 status bonus to all saves against vitality effects.

Divine Domain Select one of your deity’s domains. You gain the initial domain spell for that domain. Additionally, you gain a single divine font spell slot (as per the Cleric ability), or increase your total number of divine font spell slots by one.

Basic Ability (Primordial Lich).name: Basic Ability (Primordial Lich)
Basic Ability (Primordial Lich).description:
Your ability to destroy and manipulate life is extreme, to the point that you are fed by the frail and rendered immortal by the weak. You gain the aberration trait, as well as the following major effects:

Whisper of Broken Wills Your very presence weakens the wills of those around you and causes creatures to sink into despair. This ability is an aura with a 30-foot emanation and the curse, emotion, fear, and mental traits. Whenever an enemy would enter or end its turn within this aura, it must make a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)] saving throw against your Spell DC. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}; on a critical failure, it is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for the next minute. In any case, the creature is then immune to this aura for one minute.

Possession When you would be killed, you immediately cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} as an occult innate spell, targeting a single creature within 30 feet. The spell’s duration is changed to permanent, and you can speak telepathically with the possessed creature while within their body. Each day during their daily preparations, a creature possessed by you may choose to repeat the Will save for the possession spell; on a critical success, you are ejected from their body and return to your anchor beyond reality. If you would ever gain complete control of them, such as through the critical failure effect of possession, their body rapidly begins to change, transforming into your new body as their soul is destroyed.

Basic Ability (Ravener).name: Basic Ability (Ravener)
Basic Ability (Ravener).description:
You feed upon the souls of mortals and immortals, granting you the following major effects:

Soul Ward You are surrounded by an intangible field of necromantic energy which binds your soul to your body. Your soul ward has hit points equal to 10 * your level. Whenever you would be reduced below 1 hit point, all damage in excess of what would reduce you to 1 hit point is instead dealt to your soul ward. If this damage reduces your soul ward to fewer than 0 hit points, you are permanently destroyed. Soul ward hit points can be restored through specific abilities.

If you would go more than a week without successfully regaining soul ward hit points using Consume Soul, you begin starving, causing your soul ward to lose 1d4 hit points each day until you feed. If your soul ward loses all its Hit Points while you still have more than 1 HP, your soul is counted as uncaged until a creature of your level or lower critically fails a saving throw against your Consume Soul.

Each day your soul remains uncaged, your Intelligence modifier is reduced by 1 to a minimum of -5. This is in addition to any other effects related to your soul being uncaged, but is immediately restored to its normal value when your soul ward has at least 1 HP.

Soulsense You gain soulsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. Soulsense allows you to sense the spiritual essence of living and undead creatures, with those whose material bodies and souls are one, such as celestials and fiends, appearing brighter.

Ravenous Breath Your breath weapon is infused with void energy, stripping the very life with its touch. If you have a breath weapon, you can have it deal void damage instead of its normal damage type. In either case, a creature that fails its save against your breath weapon is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} on a critical failure). If at least one creature is drained by your breath weapon, your soul ward regains 5 hit points. You then cannot regain soul ward hit points in this manner until your next daily preparations.

Consume Soul You gain the Consume Soul free action.

Basic Ability (True Lich).name: Basic Ability (True Lich)
Basic Ability (True Lich).description:
You gain immense power from undeath, with your touch halting living processes and your magic warding you against vitality effects. You gain the following major effects:

Paralyzing Touch You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.PjwVieTk1EJJNwve]{Hand of the Lich} archetype feat. Instead of being slowed, you may have creatures damaged by your lich’s hand Strike become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round on a failure. On a critical failure, they are instead paralyzed permanently, falling @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. When doing so, the effect gains the curse and incapacitation traits.

Turning Resistance You gain a +2 status bonus to all saves against vitality effects.

Basic Ability (Wraithlich).name: Basic Ability (Wraithlich)
Basic Ability (Wraithlich).description:
You shed your flesh, becoming incorporeal and granting you the following major effects:

Incorporeal Form You gain incorporeal and wraith traits. You cannot pass through walls, but you can slip through gaps and tiny cracks. Replace your land Speed with an equal fly Speed. You can’t rise more than a few inches above the ground when you Fly. This means you can move above many types of difficult or hazardous terrain without moving slowly or being damaged, even though you can't fly without limit. You can Leap, High Jump, Long Jump, and take similar actions, and use your fly Speed for any calculations that would normally require your land Speed.

Incorporeal Items You can transmute physical items to make them part of your incorporeal form. This requires spending 10 minutes with the items within reach, during which you transform the items into part of your form; you can return items you already have incorporated to a corporeal state at the same time. The items retain all their runes and other abilities, need to be invested normally if they have the invested trait, and need to be worn, held, or stowed appropriately. Once you've incorporated the items, you and other incorporeal creatures can use them normally—you can Interact with them, Release them, and so on. Your incorporated weapons gain the benefits of the ghost touch property rune, allowing you to use them normally against both corporeal and incorporeal creatures. Incorporated items become corporeal again only if you transmute them back or are destroyed, in which case, they drop to the ground under you.

Incorporeal Physicality Your unarmed attacks become magical and deal void damage instead of their normal type. Unlike most incorporeal creatures, your Strength modifier is not –5; you keep the same Strength score you had before you became a wraith, though you can only attempt Strength-based skill checks—typically Athletics checks—against other incorporeal creatures, as normal for an incorporeal creature. Against incorporeal creatures, use your Strength normally to determine the results of Athletics checks, Strikes with melee weapons, and any other checks or damage rolls dependent on Strength.

Incorporeal Resistance You become immune to precision damage. You gain resistance 2 to all damage except for force, vitality, and any damage done by a weapon with the ghost touch rune (or any other source that acts like a ghost touch rune).

Sunlight Powerlessness Your body is anathema to sunlight and vital energy. While in direct sunlight, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}. You have weakness to vitality damage equal to half your level.

Bitter Epiphany.name: 苦涩顿悟 Bitter Epiphany
Bitter Epiphany.description:
每当你想起自己堕落的本质和与生命脱节的真相时，你陷入严重忧郁。当你花费至少一分钟于一个和你拥有同样族裔特征的活物交谈、或能够近距离观察TA时，你必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:@self.level|adjustment:+2|roller:self]豁免。之后你对苦涩顿悟临时免疫1分钟，且该生物在你下次日常准备前无法再触发苦涩顿悟。

大成功 你不受影响。

成功 你陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

失败 你陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1分钟。

大失败 你陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]，持续10分钟。

在活物身边时，你可以花时间与他们交流互动，以将苦涩顿悟从头脑中驱除。花费12小时跟随、交流互动或真诚关注一个活物后，其不再触发你的苦涩顿悟。

Breathsense.name: 呼吸感知 Breathsense
Breathsense.description:
基础能力：你的眼睛萎缩变化，让你无法感知5尺外的生物，除非使用呼吸感知。你获得30尺呼吸感知作为一种精准感官。在你的呼吸感知范围内屏息的生物对你来说视为隐形状态。要维持这种屏息状态，生物的口鼻必须被遮盖或堵住，这通常需要一只空手。

进阶能力： 你能正常用黑暗视觉或呼吸感知察觉活物。若一个生物同时对两种感官都为可见，你针对该生物的察觉检定获得+2环境加值。

Burial Site Bound.name: 墓地束缚 Burial Site Bound
Burial Site Bound.description:
你被束缚在死亡或埋葬的地方。你必须每周回到这个地方一次并将自己埋在地下8小时，期间陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}状态（你可以选择在此期间休息）。每当你花费8小时在你死亡或埋葬的地点中休息后，你的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]状态值归零。旅行时，一个装满你死亡地点泥土的棺材可以满足要求。

从你最后一次于死亡地点休息开始计算的第七个午夜，你陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}；之后每个午夜，毁灭值都增加1点，直到你死亡或将自己埋回上述墓地。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description: 你变形成一个与生前身体相仿的形态，这具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{类人形态 Humanoid Form}的效果，但持续时间为无限。出于这种状态时，你无法使用吸血鬼专长赋予的任何无武装打击，也不承受枯萎血肉的环境加值、抗力和减值。

Compulsions.name: 强迫症 Compulsions
Compulsions.description:
你患有奇怪而不可知的强迫症。具有这种弱点的典型吸血鬼不能自愿穿过流水（除非他们躲在棺材里被送过去），也不能在不被主人邀请的情况下进入私人住宅。根据GM的裁量，你可以拥有不同的强迫症——比如，一个海盗吸血鬼可能无法在未被邀请的情况下站在坚实地面上。

只要你的至少一个强迫症发作，你陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]且无法使用任何吸血鬼变体赋予的动作和法术，除了压制强迫症（Suppress Compulsions）行动。当你的强迫症将要发作时，取代上述状态，你可以选择陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]状态，该状态将持续到强迫症不再被触发。

你还获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.EfrbuFd1mtqMJ011]行动。

Consume Soul.name: Consume Soul
Consume Soul.description:
Trigger A living creature within 30 feet of you dies

You tear the soul from the creature’s body. The creature must make one final @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your spell DC or class DC, whichever is higher. You cannot perform this free action and the Steal Soul free action from the Void Shroud archetype feat at the same time; if you have access to both, however, creatures have a -2 penalty to the saving throw against either.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success You tear away a small chunk of the creature’s soul. If they are restored to life, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} in addition to any other side effects of returning to life. Your soul ward regains hit points equal to half the creature’s level.

Failure As success, but the creature’s soul is ravaged. The creature is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} and your soul ward regains hit points equal to the creature’s level.

Critical Failure As failure, but you devour the creature’s soul entirely. The creature cannot be restored to life as long as you exist except an effect like wish, and your soul ward regains hit points equal to twice the creature’s level.

Darkness.name: 黑暗 Darkness
Darkness.description:
基础能力： You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.1bkrjBZwAlwn6AFD]{Domain of Dusk} activity.

进阶能力：你能以每分钟一次的频率使用黄昏领域。你能将弥漫范围增加到30尺弥漫。如果你选择增加范围，这天剩余时间你无法再使用黄昏领域。

Discorporate.name: Discorporate
Discorporate.description:
Trigger You take excess damage to your soul ward but still have at least 51 hit points in your soul ward

You draw deeply of your soul ward, discorporating yourself to escape a dangerous situation. You suffer 50 damage to your soul ward and your physical body vanishes, reappearing 1d4 hours later in a random location within 1 mile of the location where you used Discorporate.

Domain of Dusk.name: 黄昏领域 Domain of Dusk
Domain of Dusk.description:
你招手，呼唤周围黑暗带来毁灭，阴影凝为蝙蝠、老鼠和狼出现。@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]范围内的所有活物承受@Damage[(floor((@actor.level)))d6[void]]伤害，@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]豁免，对抗你的职业DC或法术DC（以较高者为准）。在此豁免中失败的生物还陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}，持续1轮（大失败时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮）。

升级（+1） 伤害增加1d6。

Drain Companion.name: Drain Companion
Drain Companion.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements Your companion is within touching distance.

You expend the magical power stored in your bonded companion. During the current turn, you can cast one spell you prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot. You must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

Drink Blood.name: 饮血 Drink Blood
Drink Blood.description:
需求 一名受擒、麻痹、束缚、失去意识、或自愿的生物在你的触及范围内；

你将尖牙刺入这名生物，吸吮他的鲜血。如果受害者受擒，该能力需要进行一次运动检定对抗受害者的强韧DC，在其他的情况下则自动成功。如果你成功了，该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，并且你将获得等同于目标等级的临时生命，持续10分钟。继续地对目标使用该能力不会增加流失状态值，也不会赋予你更多的临时生命。

Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.name: Effect: Blasphemous Utterances
Effect: Blasphemous Utterances.description: Enemies within this aura have a -2 penalty to saving throws against mental effects and can’t take actions that have the concentrate trait unless they succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:8]. Failing this check wastes the action.

Effect: Grave Squire.name: Effect: Grave Squire
Effect: Grave Squire.description: While the piece is in their possession, your squire gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, as well as resistance to your ruinous element equal to half their level.

Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+1).name: Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+1)
Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+1).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.PVwVed0B50szn0u8]{Lord Beyond the Grave}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead}.

Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+2).name: Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+2)
Effect: Lord Beyond the Grave (+2).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.PVwVed0B50szn0u8]{Lord Beyond the Grave}

The undead you animate gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead}.

Effect: Sickening Aura.name: 效果：致呕灵光 Sickening Aura
Effect: Sickening Aura.description: 该光环中的生物对抗疾病、毒素和造成恶心状态的效果时全豁免-1状态减值。

Effect: Void Shroud.name: Effect: Void Shroud
Effect: Void Shroud.description: Enemies in the aura have a -2 status penalty to saving throws against death effects.

Fifth Doctrine (Undead Lord).name: Fifth Doctrine (Undead Lord)
Fifth Doctrine (Undead Lord).description: Your proficiency rank for Fortitude saves increases to master. When you roll a success at a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

First Doctrine (Undead Lord).name: First Doctrine (Undead Lord)
First Doctrine (Undead Lord).description: You’re trained in light armor, and you have expert proficiency in Fortitude saves. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M6cWLywN0aWnX5Gl]{Undead Master Dedication} archetype feat. You can select the dedication feat for another archetype, even if you haven’t yet gained three feats from Undead Master. You can prepare @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead} in the spell slots gained from your harmful or healing font. At 13th level, if you gain the divine defense class feature, you also gain expert proficiency in light armor.

Fourth Doctrine (Undead Lord).name: Fourth Doctrine (Undead Lord)
Fourth Doctrine (Undead Lord).description: Your proficiency ranks for divine spell attack rolls and spell DCs increase to expert.

Innate Magic.name: 内生魔法 Innate Magic
Innate Magic.description:
基础能力： 你能以神术内在法术的形式施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{恐惧术 Fear}，每天一次。它被升阶到等于你等级一半的环级。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于受训，则提高至受训。

进阶能力： 你能以神术内在法术的形式施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.N1Z1oLPdBxaSgrEE]{吸血鬼之宴 Vampiric Feast}，每天一次。它被升阶到等于你等级一半的环级。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于专家，则提高至专家。

Lesson of Undeath.name: Lesson of Undeath
Lesson of Undeath.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cd6Crl4wpQaMSYrF]{Subjugate Undead} focus spell as a hex (granting it the hex and witch traits), and your familiar learns @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0JWyMwVnLxX9CDYQ]{Rouse Skeletons}.

Material Weakness.name: 材料弱点 Material Weakness
Material Weakness.description:
你获得一种特定材料的弱点。选择一种材料，对抗这种材料制成的武器时，你获得等于你等级一半的弱点。另外，你的感官无法穿透这种材料，哪怕它是透明的。

你可以从以下材料中选择弱点：寒铁、夕木、力场效果、魔法银、魔法木、或者发出至少5尺明亮光的魔法武器。根据GM的裁决，你的弱点也可以针对其他材料，比如命能效果，精金或其他特征、材料。

Memory Nourishment.name: 记忆滋养 Memory Nourishment
Memory Nourishment.description:
基础能力： 你汲取生物的记忆而非血液。你的不死饥渴是活物的记忆。你获得100尺思维感知作为一种模糊感官，它允许你发现范围内的有心智生物。

你只能对有心智生物使用饮血（它们不必是活物）。当你对一个生物使用饮血并获得临时生命值时，它陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}而非流失。如果你拥有吸干抹净专长，受害者在陷入呆滞5时植物人化，永久陷入失去意识状态，直到呆滞状态被治愈。无论是哪种情况，你都可以看到受害者脑海中浮现的一段记忆。

进阶能力： 当你使用饮血，你可以选择改变、增强或抹去看到的记忆，效果同4环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{修订记忆 Rewrite Memory}，DC为你的职业DC或法术DC（以较高者为准）。@Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]

Predatory Assault.name: 掠食突袭 Predatory Assault
Predatory Assault.description: 对同一个目标进行两次无武装打击，正常应用你的多重攻击减值。两次打击必须针对同一个目标。如果任一打击命中并造成伤害，你可以用自由动作对同一个目标尝试一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]，你在第二次打击结束时进行此动作。该擒拿检定不适用当前的多重攻击减值，但在后续计算时它算作一次攻击。

Qi Nourishment.name: 精气滋养 Qi Nourishment
Qi Nourishment.description:
基础能力： 你汲取精气而非血液。你的不死饥渴是活物的精气。当你对一个生物使用饮血并获得临时生命值时，你还恢复1点聚能点。目标可以花费1个聚能点来防止陷入流失状态，若它们如此做，你无法因饮血恢复聚能点。

进阶能力： 1分钟内你第三次通过饮血获得临时生命值时，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，持续1分钟。你只能用这个额外动作来打击或行走。

Remember Life.name: Remember Life
Remember Life.description:
Requirements Your phantasmagoria isn’t active

You tap into your memories allowing you to more heavily alter the world around you. Your phantasmagoria activates. If you spend two actions, you can also use a 1- or 2-action impulse. Your phantasmagoria is a 10-foot emanation where images and specters of your past life flow around you. These images don’t damage anything, affect the environment around you, or block line of sight unless you have another ability that allows it to. While in your phantasmagoria, you can use impulses granted by the Ghost archetype, but cannot use actions with the concentrate trait.

Your phantasmagoria automatically deactivates if you're knocked out, you use an impulse with the overflow trait, or you Dismiss the aura. Though you can't use new impulses while your phantasmagoria is deactivated, ones you already used remain, and you can still Sustain any that can be sustained.

If a Ghost archetype impulse requires a saving throw, it is made against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Special If you have another aura that allows you to use impulses (such as the kinetic aura from the Kineticist class), you can also enter that aura when you use Phantasmagoria. Alternatively, you can enter your phantasmagoria when you use an action that causes you to enter that aura.

Additionally, if you have the Rage action, you can choose to enter Rage when you use this action.

Revulsion.name: 厌恶 Revulsion
Revulsion.description:
选择两种你厌恶的物品。你无法主动靠近这两种物品10尺以内。生物能用一个交互动作挥舞该物品，厌恶起效一轮（类似举起盾牌）。如果你非自愿地来到了厌恶对象的10尺范围内，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}状态，当你在厌恶对象10尺外的地点结束一个动作时，逃跑状态结束。在暴露于厌恶之物下的一轮之后，你可以花费一个具有专注特征的单动作尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:25]豁免。成功时，你在下一分钟内克服厌恶，大成功克服1小时。

你可以从以下物品中选择厌恶物品：铃声，明亮光，大蒜，镜子，圣徽，流水或大声说出的秘密。根据GM裁量，你可以拥有其他厌恶，比如针对特定形状，没有角落的房间或其他微小或时常露面的物品。

特殊 你可以多次选择此弱点，每次选择两个额外物品。

Rigor Mortis.name: 尸僵 Rigor Mortis
Rigor Mortis.description:
基础能力： 你的陆地速度降低10尺（最低降至10尺）。你无视困难地形，且免疫会让你倒地的效果。你无法使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{趴下 Drop Prone}动作。你跳跃时，可以让水平和/或垂直距离增加10尺，不影响DC。另外，你的跳跃不会触发通常因移动动作触发的反应动作（如反应打击）。

进阶能力： 你跳跃时，可以让水平和/或垂直距离增加10尺，不影响DC，该距离与基础能力叠加。另外你可以使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{趴下 Drop Prone}动作自愿陷入倒地状态。

Servitor Assembly.name: Servitor Assembly
Servitor Assembly.description:
You detach one of your inactive servitors, placing it into any open, adjacent space. Alternatively, you reattach an adjacent servitor. Servitors attached to you are considered to be inactive.

If your body is destroyed, any attached servitors are destroyed as well.

Servitor Lunge.name: Servitor Lunge
Servitor Lunge.description:
Requirements Your last action was a critical hit with a melee Strike, and you have at least one servitor attached.

One of your servitors detaches adjacent to the target, and the target is grabbed by that servitor.

Sharp Fangs.name: 尖牙 Sharp Fangs
Sharp Fangs.description:
基础能力： 你的门齿伸长；你获得尖牙无武装攻击，造成1d6穿刺伤害。该无武装攻击属于搏击武器组，具有背刺、擒拿和无武装特征。

进阶能力： 当你的尖牙暴击时，你可以立刻用一个自由动作使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.p0I1DIcTJcAmJqz4]{饮血 Drink Blood}。若目标不满足饮血的正常需求，你必须尝试一次运动检定，就如目标受擒时那样。这是一种重击专精效果。

Shatter Block.name: Shatter Block
Shatter Block.description:
Requirements A creature scores a critical hit on you, and you have at least one servitor attached.

The critical hit becomes a normal hit instead, and one of your servitors detaches from you into an open, adjacent space, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Sickening Aura.name: 致呕灵光 Sickening Aura
Sickening Aura.description:
基础能力： 你发出一股致病光环。该光环为30尺弥漫，拥有灵光和神术特征。该光环中的生物对抗疾病、毒素和造成恶心状态的效果时全豁免-1状态减值。

进阶能力： 一个进入你周围10尺弥漫范围或在其中结束回合的敌人必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]豁免，对抗你的法术DC或职业DC（以较高者为准）。失败时，生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，且在灵光范围内无法将恶心值降为1以下。成功时，该生物对此效果临时免疫1分钟，大成功时临时免疫1小时。

Sixth Doctrine (Undead Lord).name: Sixth Doctrine (Undead Lord)
Sixth Doctrine (Undead Lord).description: You gain master proficiency with your deity's favored weapon, spell attack modifier, and spell DC.

Spellsteal Transmutation.name: Spellsteal Transmutation
Spellsteal Transmutation.description:
Requirements You have at least one spell imbued in your body through Spellstealing Counter

If your next action is to Cast a Spell from a spell slot or use a prepared spell, you can instead cast one of your imbued spells. The expended spell slot or prepared spell must be at least one level higher than the imbued spell, and you must have enough actions to cast the imbued spell. The imbued spell is cast at one level lower than the expended spell slot or prepared spell.

Spellstealing Counter.name: Spellstealing Counter
Spellstealing Counter.description:
Trigger You see a creature Cast a Spell

Requirements You have an unexpended spell slot or prepared spell the same level as the spell being cast

Expend a spell slot or prepared spell of the same level as the spell being cast, losing it as if you’d cast the triggering spell. Then, attempt to counteract the triggering spell. If successful, the spell is countered and imbued into the runes in your body. You can have up to three spells imbued into your body at a time in this manner.

Stance: Hungry Ghost Stance.name: Stance: Hungry Ghost Stance
Stance: Hungry Ghost Stance.description:
You enter a twisted stance that allows you to draw life force from other creatures. The only Strikes you can make are hungry ghost Strikes. These deal 1d4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the deadly d4, finesse, unarmed, and void traits.

If you hit a living creature in this stance with an unarmed strike, you can regain hit points equal to the number of damage dice the strike deals.

Steal Soul.name: Steal Soul
Steal Soul.description:
Trigger A creature dies within your Void Shroud aura

The creature must attempt one final Fortitude save. On a failure, you siphon the soul from the dying creature, storing it in a black mote of energy that orbits your head. The creature can't be brought back from the dead while its soul is trapped in this way. Once per day, as a single action, you can consume a mote to heal a number of Hit Points equal to double the soul's level. This utterly destroys the soul, making the creature impossible to bring back to life without a wish or similar magic. The lich can have a number of motes orbiting them equal to their Charisma modifier (to a minimum of one mote); if the lich gains an additional mote, the oldest one is released, its soul free to travel to the afterlife. If your body is destroyed, all motes are released.

Having a creature’s mote grants you power over it; until it is destroyed or released, you are it’s final arbiter for any decisions related to it. The full extents of this are up to the GM, but examples include causing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} to automatically succeed if you cast it targeting the creature

Sunlight.name: 阳光 Sunlight
Sunlight.description: 如果暴露于阳光直射下，你将立即获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。每次在阳光下结束回合，你的缓慢值都将增加1点。如果你因此失去了所有动作，你被摧毁。由于你对于光的超自然厌恶，你不会投下影子，也不会照映在镜子里。当你获得进阶不死增益时，你不会再被阳光摧毁，但这不会阻止你因暴露在阳光下陷入缓慢。

Sustaining Blood.name: 延命之血 Sustaining Blood
Sustaining Blood.description:
基础能力： 你的血具有再生和洗脑功效。你可以承受@Damage[1[bleed]]伤害，通过将自己的血喂给一个自愿活物来进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{急救 Administer First Aid}，或者你承受@Damage[2d8]伤害来进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{治疗疾病 Treat Disease}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{治疗伤势 Treat Wounds}；不管是哪种，你都不需要医疗工具包，并且在检定上获得+1物品加值。一个喝下你血液的生物对抗你的心灵效果时全豁免受到-2减值，并且在一周内停止老化。

进阶能力： 你学会如何将喝下自己血液的人变为奴仆。花费一天的休整期，你可以将一个自愿活物转化为奴仆。生物的等级必须至少比你低4级；当你这么做时，该生物获得诺斯费拉图血奴能力（见《怪物图鉴3》第284页），它的等级增加1，且变为被你控制的仆从。你可以控制多个奴仆，数量最多为你的魅力调整值；之后创造超出数量的奴仆时，会从最早的奴隶开始解放。这些奴仆和你控制下的其他仆从分别计算，但同一时间，你仍然只能主动控制最多4个仆从。

Telekinetic Powers.name: 隔空取物 Telekinetic Powers
Telekinetic Powers.description:
基础能力： 你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{念动射弹 Telekinetic Projectile}。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于受训，则提高至受训。

进阶能力： 你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{念动战技 Telekinetic Maneuver}，每天一次。如果你至少为10级，你还能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tpLTLbJUrYcMWGld]{念动移物 Telekinetic Haul}，每天一次。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于专家，则提高至专家。

Third Doctrine (Undead Lord).name: Third Doctrine (Undead Lord)
Third Doctrine (Undead Lord).description: You gain expert proficiency with your deity's favored weapon, simple weapons, and unarmed attacks.

Vampire Ability (Breathsense).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (呼吸感知)
Vampire Ability (Breathsense).description: 你的眼睛萎缩变化，让你无法感知5尺外的生物，除非使用呼吸感知。你获得30尺呼吸感知作为一种精准感官。在你的呼吸感知范围内屏息的生物对你来说视为隐形状态。要维持这种屏息状态，生物的口鼻必须被遮盖或堵住，这通常需要一只空手。

Vampire Ability (Darkness).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (黑暗)
Vampire Ability (Darkness).description: 你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.1bkrjBZwAlwn6AFD]{黄昏领域 Domain of Dusk}行动。

Vampire Ability (Innate Magic).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (内生魔法)
Vampire Ability (Innate Magic).description: 你能以神术内在法术的形式施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{恐惧术 Fear}，每天一次。它被升阶到等于你等级一半的环级。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于受训，则提高至受训。

Vampire Ability (Memory Nourishment).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (记忆滋养)
Vampire Ability (Memory Nourishment).description:
你汲取生物的记忆而非血液。你的不死饥渴是活物的记忆。你获得100尺思维感知作为一种模糊感官，它允许你发现范围内的有心智生物。

你只能对有心智生物使用饮血（它们不必是活物）。当你对一个生物使用饮血并获得临时生命值时，它陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}而非流失。如果你拥有吸干抹净专长，受害者在陷入呆滞5时植物人化，永久陷入失去意识状态，直到呆滞状态被治愈。无论是哪种情况，你都可以看到受害者脑海中浮现的一段记忆。

Vampire Ability (Qi Nourishment).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (精气滋养)
Vampire Ability (Qi Nourishment).description: 你汲取精气而非血液。你的不死饥渴是活物的精气。当你对一个生物使用饮血并获得临时生命值时，你还恢复1点聚能点。目标可以花费1个聚能点来防止陷入流失状态，若它们如此做，你无法因饮血恢复聚能点。

Vampire Ability (Rigor Mortis).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (尸僵)
Vampire Ability (Rigor Mortis).description: 你的陆地速度降低10尺（最低降至10尺）。你无视困难地形，且免疫会让你倒地的效果。你无法使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{趴下 Drop Prone}动作。你跳跃时，可以让水平和/或垂直距离增加10尺，不影响DC。另外，你的跳跃不会触发通常因移动动作触发的反应动作（如反应打击）。

Vampire Ability (Sharp Fangs).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (尖牙)
Vampire Ability (Sharp Fangs).description: 你的门齿伸长；你获得尖牙无武装攻击，造成1d6穿刺伤害。该无武装攻击属于搏击武器组，具有背刺、擒拿和无武装特征。

Vampire Ability (Sickening Aura).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (致呕灵光)
Vampire Ability (Sickening Aura).description: 你发出一股致病光环。该光环为30尺弥漫，拥有灵光和神术特征。该光环中的生物对抗疾病、毒素和造成恶心状态的效果时全豁免-1状态减值。

Vampire Ability (Sustaining Blood).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (延命之血)
Vampire Ability (Sustaining Blood).description: 你的血具有再生和洗脑功效。你可以承受@Damage[1[bleed]]伤害，通过将自己的血喂给一个自愿活物来进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{急救 Administer First Aid}，或者你承受@Damage[2d8]伤害来进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{治疗疾病 Treat Disease}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{治疗伤势 Treat Wounds}；不管是哪种，你都不需要医疗工具包，并且在检定上获得+1物品加值。一个喝下你血液的生物对抗你的心灵效果时全豁免受到-2减值，并且在一周内停止老化。

Vampire Ability (Telekinetic Powers).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (隔空取物)
Vampire Ability (Telekinetic Powers).description: 你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.60sgbuMWN0268dB7]{念动射弹 Telekinetic Projectile}。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于受训，则提高至受训。

Vampire Ability (Vampiric Speed).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (吸血鬼之速)
Vampire Ability (Vampiric Speed).description: 你的陆地速度增加5尺。你还可以在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}时全速移动。

Vampire Ability (Withered Flesh).name: 吸血鬼能力 Vampire Ability (枯萎血肉)
Vampire Ability (Withered Flesh).description: 你的身体干瘪扭曲，一眼看去更像尸体。你从基础不死增益和进阶不死增益中获得的环境加值和抗力翻倍，但交涉和欺骗检定承受-2减值。你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.fWg5HT95bFBxKhNA]{变身 Change Shape}动作。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Breathsense).name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (呼吸感知)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Breathsense).description: 你能正常用黑暗视觉或呼吸感知察觉活物。若一个生物同时对两种感官都为可见，你针对该生物的察觉检定获得+2环境加值。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Darkness).name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (黑暗)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Darkness).description: 你能以每分钟一次的频率使用黄昏领域。你能将弥漫范围增加到@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]。如果你选择增加范围，这天剩余时间你无法再使用黄昏领域。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Innate Magic).name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (内生魔法)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Innate Magic).description: 你能以神术内在法术的形式施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.N1Z1oLPdBxaSgrEE]{吸血鬼之宴 Vampiric Feast}，每天一次。它被升阶到等于你等级一半的环级。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于专家，则提高至专家。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Memory Nourish.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (记忆滋养)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Memory Nourish.description: 当你使用饮血，你可以选择改变、增强或抹去看到的记忆，效果同4环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{修订记忆 Rewrite Memory}，DC为你的职业DC或法术DC（以较高者为准）。@Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]

Vampire Advanced Ability (Qi Nourishment.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (精气滋养)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Qi Nourishment.description: 1分钟内你第三次通过饮血获得临时生命值时，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，持续1分钟。你只能用这个额外动作来打击或行走。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Rigor Mortis).name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (尸僵)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Rigor Mortis).description: 你跳跃时，可以让水平和/或垂直距离增加10尺，不影响DC，该距离与基础能力叠加。另外你可以使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{趴下 Drop Prone}动作自愿陷入倒地状态。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Sharp Fangs).name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (尖牙)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Sharp Fangs).description: 当你的尖牙暴击时，你可以立刻用一个自由动作使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.p0I1DIcTJcAmJqz4]{饮血 Drink Blood}。若目标不满足饮血的正常需求，你必须尝试一次运动检定，就如目标受擒时那样。这是一种重击专精效果。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Sickening Aura.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (致呕灵光)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Sickening Aura.description: 一个进入你周围10尺弥漫范围或在其中结束回合的敌人必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]豁免，对抗你的法术DC或职业DC（以较高者为准）。失败时，生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，且在灵光范围内无法将恶心值降为1以下。成功时，该生物对此效果临时免疫1分钟，大成功时临时免疫1小时。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Sustaining Blo.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (延命之血)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Sustaining Blo.description: 你学会如何将喝下自己血液的人变为奴仆。花费一天的休整期，你可以将一个自愿活物转化为奴仆。生物的等级必须至少比你低4级；当你这么做时，该生物获得诺斯费拉图血奴能力（见《怪物图鉴3》第284页），它的等级增加1，且变为被你控制的仆从。你可以控制多个奴仆，数量最多为你的魅力调整值；之后创造超出数量的奴仆时，会从最早的奴隶开始解放。这些奴仆和你控制下的其他仆从分别计算，但同一时间，你仍然只能主动控制最多4个仆从。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Telekinetic Po.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (隔空取物)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Telekinetic Po.description: 你能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mrDi3v933gsmnw25]{念动战技 Telekinetic Maneuver}，每天一次。如果你至少为10级，你还能以神术内在法术的形式施展@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.tpLTLbJUrYcMWGld]{念动移物 Telekinetic Haul}，每天一次。如果你的法术攻击骰和法术DC熟练度低于专家，则提高至专家。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Speed.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (吸血鬼之速)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Vampiric Speed.description: 你的速度超凡脱俗。你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.p2I4o9Cc6UrXvjhO]{凶猛冲刺 Furious Sprint}野蛮人专长，它对你来说失去狂暴特征。

Vampire Advanced Ability (Withered Flesh.name: 吸血鬼进阶能力 Vampire Advanced Ability (枯萎血肉)
Vampire Advanced Ability (Withered Flesh.description: 你的血肉变得像肉干一样坚韧，保护你远离一切疾病，除了最致命的那些。你获得对疾病和毒素的免疫，并且增加等于你等级的最大生命值。

Vampiric Speed.name: 吸血鬼之速 Vampiric Speed
Vampiric Speed.description:
基础能力： 你的陆地速度增加5尺。你还可以在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracking}时全速移动。

进阶能力： 你的速度超凡脱俗。你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.p2I4o9Cc6UrXvjhO]{凶猛冲刺 Furious Sprint}野蛮人专长，它对你来说失去狂暴特征。

Withered Flesh.name: 枯萎血肉 Withered Flesh
Withered Flesh.description:
基础能力： 你的身体干瘪扭曲，一眼看去更像尸体。你从基础不死增益和进阶不死增益中获得的环境加值和抗力翻倍，但交涉和欺骗检定承受-2减值。你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.fWg5HT95bFBxKhNA]{变身 Change Shape}动作。

进阶能力： 你的血肉变得像肉干一样坚韧，保护你远离一切疾病，除了最致命的那些。你获得对疾病和毒素的免疫，并且增加等于你等级的最大生命值。

Yhidothrus, the Ravager Worm.name: Yhidothrus, the Ravager Worm
Yhidothrus, the Ravager Worm.description:
Yhidothrus is the demon lord of age, time and worms, and a hateful creature feared by those who worship him. Appearing as a massive, black-skinned worm of nearly infinite length, it is rumored that he is still a qlippoth lord at the end of his body as none have ever seen where his body ends. His worshippers are outcasts and isolationists, fearing old age and the ravages of time enough to sell themselves into his service to abate it. Worm-worshipping cults, liches, worms that walk, and even conqueror worms all pay some homage to the Ravager Worm in some degree.

Category Demon Lords

Edicts seek to extend your life, worship and honor worms

Anathema seek to end your existence, pray to Yhidothrus for aid

Areas of Concern age, time, and worms

Divine Reverence.name: Divine Reverence
Divine Reverence.description:
Basic Ability: You give homage to a deity that grants patronage to vampires, such as Urgathoa, Zon-Kuthon, or Zura. Select a deity to worship; this deity typically must allow unholy. You gain the unholy trait, gain access to their favored weapon if it is uncommon or rare, and become trained in their divine skill (or another skill of your choice if you are already trained). You are bound by their edicts and anathema, and your Strikes gain the unholy trait.

Advanced Ability: You can call upon greater magic from your deity. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{Domain Initiate} cleric feat. At 14th level or higher, you can select the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uR44wELN9OlU68cL]{Advanced Domain} cleric feat using one of your class feats.

Drive the Stake.name: Drive the Stake
Drive the Stake.description:
Requirements You are wielding a stake and a tool to drive it; the target is a vampire that is within melee reach and either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{prone}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{immobilized}, or you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{undetected} by them.

You attempt to drive a stake through the creature’s heart. Make a melee @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} using strength; this attack uses your simple weapon proficiency. On a successful hit, the target suffers piercing damage equal to its level as the stake is impaled into the target’s heart, rendering it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{paralyzed} until the stake is removed. If the target has a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.0EEGckO0bIMMQM6z]{Material Weakness} and the stake is made of that material, they are instead instantly reduced to 0 hit points. A stake can be removed from a vampire by spending two actions wrenching it from the vampire’s chest.

This attack suffers a -2 circumstance penalty if the target is wearing medium or heavy armor or is under the effects of an ability that hardens the target’s skin such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{oaken resilience} spell.

Effect: Shadow Form.name: Effect: Shadow Form
Effect: Shadow Form.description:
You transform into pure shadow, absorbing your body and gear into a cloud of darkness, or you shift back to your physical form. In your shadow form, you gain a climb speed equal to your land speed and can move through any gap that isn’t airtight; however, you can only move along solid surfaces that aren’t highly reflective or liquid. If the surface you are on is destroyed, you return to physical form and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{stunned 1}. While in your shadow form, you gain a weakness to damage from effects with the light trait equal to your level.

While in shadow form and exposed to sunlight, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{slowed 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{slowed 2} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.R7k5R0fC1U61OhIR]{Sunlight Weakness}). Each round you are exposed to sunlight while in shadow form, you suffer damage equal to your level that cannot be resisted or negated and has the light trait. Additionally, your shadow form is extremely obvious while in direct sunlight, making you unable to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}.

While in direct sunlight, you can use this action as a reaction to immediately revert to your physical form, ignoring its normal requirement. Unless you have the Shadow Form Advanced Ability, you can only stay in your shadow form for one round before automatically reverting back.

Entrancing Beauty.name: Entrancing Beauty
Entrancing Beauty.description:
Basic Ability: Your beauty is supernatural, capable of entrancing and terrifying foes. You gain a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy, Deception, and Intimidation checks made against creatures that can see you. When you would make one of these checks against a creature that can see you and would roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead. These bonuses do not apply while you are suffering from the penalties of one of your vampiric weaknesses.

Advanced Ability: You can leverage your vampiric charisma to draw in enemies for feeding. Creatures that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{fascinated} by you suffer a -2 status penalty to their DC to resist your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.49F65W6VwuXhmv8K]{Drink Blood}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposition} actions. Additionally, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.7Y5bMamBFhCHX3Be]{Come to Me} activity.

Ghoulish Degeneration.name: Ghoulish Degeneration
Ghoulish Degeneration.description:
Basic Ability: Your bloodline descends from horrid vampires whose curse had mingled with the ghoul curse, creating a horrifying combination of the two. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EHJRMCBRL4YeBN6l]{Ghoul Dedication} feat. Your undead hunger becomes the flesh and blood of dead creatures, following similar rules to the ghoul undead hunger. When you Consume Flesh, you also gain the benefits of Drinking Blood.

Advanced Ability: You become more powerful when fully fed. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7GrACprIxZuarGDs]{Grave Strength} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.feats.Item.5OjG72dBamNNJR9O]{Predatory Assault} archetype feats. If you would gain a fly speed, the speed bonus from Grave Strength also applies to your fly speed.

Holy Aversion.name: Holy Aversion
Holy Aversion.description:
Divine powers are painful to you, with holy ground leeching your life and holy weapons burning like fire. You gain a weakness to holy damage equal to half your level, and cannot gain the holy trait. In addition, you suffer @Damage[1[spirit,persistent]|traits:holy] persistent holy spirit damage while in any of the following circumstances:

  • You are within 15 feet of an altar that has been used within the last month.

  • You are within the area of a holy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dbd5W6G8U2vzWolN]{consecrate} ritual. When doing so, you always count as anathema to the ritual caster’s deity.

  • You are touching a creature with the holy trait whose level is greater than or equal to your level - 4.

These penalties do not apply if you worship the deity associated with the altar or ritual.

Leathery Wings.name: Leathery Wings
Leathery Wings.description:
Basic Ability: You have a set of large, leathery bat wings which allow you to leap and move with extreme ease, though not fully fly. When @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaping} horizontally, you move an additional 5 feet. You don't automatically fail your checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} if you don't Stride at least 10 feet first. d to t

The sight of you is mesmerizing, a single gesture calling those enthralled by you to your side. Choose one target creature. You meet their gaze, forcing them to make a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher).

If you spent two actions to use this ability, the creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Strides} towards you as a free action, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Strides} twice if you spent three actions.

High Stakes.description: All creatures, to an extent, are weak to having a stake driven through their heart; your vampiric nature causes such an occurrence to be a much greater issue than other undead, however. If a creature has a stake and a means of driving it into your chest, they perform the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-heresy-of-the-whispering-way.abilities.Item.cLoPpfdxKm8whvMy]{Drive the Stake} activity.

You suffer a -3 circumstance penalty to this saving throw and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{sickened 1} for the next minute unless you critically succeed the saving throw as the taste of foul blood reviles your senses. If you are immune to disease and poison from your vampire archetype’s undead benefits (such as from playing a vampire with the Unleashing the Undead variant rule), you lose that immunity.
